## PCA

<pre>
trout <- read.structure("gila-trout.stru")
</pre>. 

```{r}
library(adegenet)
library(RColorBrewer)

trout_mod <- tab(trout, freq = TRUE, NA.method = "mean")
trout_pca <- dudi.pca(trout_mod, scale = FALSE, scannf = FALSE, nf = 2)
colors <- brewer.pal(5, "Set2")
s.class(trout_pca$l1, pop(trout), grid = FALSE, col = colors)
```

## DAPC

```{r}
clusters <- find.clusters(trout, n.pca = 25)
trout_dapc <- dapc(trout, pop = pop(trout), n.pca = 25)
summary(trout_dapc)
scatter(trout_dapc)
compoplot(trout_dapc)
```
